languages.text: "Я просто говорю, что вмешивать личное отношение в боевое задание было бы совершенно непрофессионально".
"I'm simply saying that it would be utterly unprofessional to involve personal feelings in a combat assignment."
languages.original_text: "Я просто говорю, что вмешивать личное отношение в боевое задание было бы совершенно непрофессионально".

traits.locale_text: "I'm simply saying that it would be utterly unprofessional to involve personal feelings in a combat assignment."
"I'm simply saying that it would be utterly unprofessional to involve personal feelings in a combat assignment."
"I'm simply saying that it would be utterly unprofessional to involve personal feelings in a combat assignment."
"I'm simply saying that it would be utterly unprofessional to involve personal feelings in a combat assignment."
"I'm simply saying that it would be utterly unprofessional to involve personal feelings in a combat assignment."

languages.text: « Tout ce que je dis, c'est qu'il serait contraire à l'éthique professionnelle de mêler des sentiments personnels à une mission de combat. »
languages.original_text: "I'm simply saying that it would be utterly unprofessional to involve personal feelings in a combat assignment."

traits.locale_text: « Tout ce que je dis, c'est qu'il serait contraire à l'éthique professionnelle de mêler des sentiments personnels à une mission de combat. »

languages.text: 「私はただ、戦闘任務に個人的な感情を持ち込むのはまったくもって職業意識に欠ける、と言っているだけです」
languages.original_text: "I'm simply saying that it would be utterly unprofessional to involve personal feelings in a combat assignment."

traits.locale_text: 「私はただ、戦闘任務に個人的な感情を持ち込むのはまったくもって職業意識に欠ける、と言っているだけです」

languages.text: «Solo digo que sería muy poco profesional mezclar sentimientos personales con una misión de combate».
languages.original_text: "I'm simply saying that it would be utterly unprofessional to involve personal feelings in a combat assignment."

traits.locale_text: «Solo digo que sería muy poco profesional mezclar sentimientos personales con una misión de combate».

languages.text: “我只是想说，在战斗行动之中掺杂个人感情，这是极其不专业的做法。”
languages.original_text: "I'm simply saying that it would be utterly unprofessional to involve personal feelings in a combat assignment."

traits.locale_text: “我只是想说，在战斗行动之中掺杂个人感情，这是极其不专业的做法。”

languages.text: "Sadece muharebe görevlerine bu tarz duyguların dâhil olmasını profesyonel bulmuyorum."
languages.original_text: "I'm simply saying that it would be utterly unprofessional to involve personal feelings in a combat assignment."

traits.locale_text: "Sadece muharebe görevlerine bu tarz duyguların dâhil olmasını profesyonel bulmuyorum."

languages.text: "Ich sage nur, es wäre ausgesprochen unprofessionell, persönliche Gefühle in einen Kampfeinsatz einfließen zu lassen."
languages.original_text: "I'm simply saying that it would be utterly unprofessional to involve personal feelings in a combat assignment."

traits.locale_text: "Ich sage nur, es wäre ausgesprochen unprofessionell, persönliche Gefühle in einen Kampfeinsatz einfließen zu lassen."
